title: Fratelli Figurato
knownFor: Best quality Neapolitan pizza, handmade fresh pasta
description: Small cozy pizzeria run by Italian Figurato brothers. Authentic Neapolitan atmosphere like Naples' little streets. Dozen excellent pizzas (classic and original, constantly changing). Handmade fresh pasta daily, excellent carbonara. Daily set menu available. Italian wines at affordable prices. Popular with Italians and locals.
